quoteFirst: And take her through he did. At
quoteLast: my old friend, locomotive 590, brought the flier up from Chicago, six minutes ahead of the schedule. Kelly had done himself proud this time.
title: Careers of Danger and Daring
author: Moffett, Cleveland, 1863-1926; Hambidge, Jay, 1867-1924 [Illustrator]; Varian, George, 1865-1923 [Illustrator]
